metadata.title: DPM Dar, Secretary Rubio discuss bilateral, regional matters

content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, Aug 4 (APP):Deputy Prime Minister and Foreign Minister Senator Mohammad Ishaq Dar on Monday spoke with the US Secretary of State Marco Rubio. During the telephonic conversation, the two leaders discussed a range of bilateral matters and exchanged views on current regional and international issues, according to a Foreign Office press release. Both sides also agreed to remain in contact and continue cooperation in areas of mutual interest.
